post_message: Pam Hupp charged with murder - O'Fallon, Missouri Police and St. Charles County Prosecuting Attorney's Office hold a press conference on charges related to last week's shooting. Hupp has been charged with 1st degree murder in the shooting death of Louis Gumpenberger. She was arrested Tuesday. She was a central figure in a highly publicized murder trial covered extensively by Fox 2 News.

commenter_a: @username has the knowledge, skills, and class of Reagan. She's disarming when she speaks, and able to get persuasive messages about individual liberty across to people who instinctively resist it. If she's nominated by the GOP, I think she has the best chance to win. If she's elected, she could invigorate the conservative/ libertarian movement and put our nation back on course.
